title: School impact districts; new building permit
context: [§46-142.5 School impact districts; new building permit requirements.] No new residential development in a designated school impact district under chapter 302A shall be issued a residential building permit or condominium property regime building permit until the department of education provides written confirmation that the permit applicant has fulfilled its school impact fee requirements. This section shall only apply to new dwelling units. [L 2007, c 245, §3] Cross References Impact fees for public highways, see §§264-121 to 127.
